title: pAlaya shrI padmanAbha
sahitya:
pAlaya shrI padmanAbha pAlitalOka


anupallavi

  bAlacandra  madahara bhAlashObhi mrgamada


caraNam 1    uttama puruSa vibhO cittaja janaka shaurE vittaputra kaLatrEhA yattajana duravApa
    caraNam 2    dant rAja tApahara bandhura rAjIvAruNAdhara sindhu sutAkarAmbuja santata lALita pAda
    caraNam 3    dEva munigaNAmEyam tAvakIna mahimAnam jIvalOkE kOvAstOtum kEvalam nipuNayatE
